name: iv
description: JS template engine mixing JS and NG2 concepts
author: Bertrand Laporte

scripts.build: yarn run build-compiler && yarn run build-test
scripts.test: yarn run build && yarn run mocha
scripts.dev: yarn run clean && concurrently -r "rollup -w -c rollup.compiler.config.js" "chokidar --silent 'src/test/*' 'dist/rollup-plugin-iv.es.js' -c 'echo Building and running tests... && yarn run build-test'" "chokidar --silent 'dist/test.js' -c 'yarn run mocha'"
scripts.build-samples: yarn run build-compiler && cpx 'src/samples/**/*.{html,js,css,svg}' dist && rollup -c rollup.samples.config.js
scripts.watch-samples: yarn run build-compiler && concurrently -r "yarn start" "cpx -w 'src/samples/**/*.{html,js,css,svg}' dist" "rollup -w -c rollup.samples.config.js"
scripts.e2e: yarn build-samples && concurrently -r -k -s first "yarn start" "./node_modules/.bin/protractor protractor.conf.js"
scripts.benchmarks: yarn build-samples && concurrently -r -k -s first "yarn start" "./node_modules/.bin/protractor protractor.conf.js --perf"
